title: Arclund's Archive
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:scp-archive]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
  --header-title: "Arclund's Archive";
  --header-subtitle: "For the Time Lost and Long Forgotten";
}
[[/module]]

[[include component:image-block | name= Markglobe.gif | caption= Locus Anchored | width= 700px | align=center]]

[[=]]
[[size larger]]##green|Greetings!##[[/size]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[size larger]]##green|Many thanks for opening this Locus Point.##[[/size]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[size larger]]##green|I am Arclund, archivist and cartographer of those Outside.##[[/size]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[size larger]]##green|Are you the Inheritors?##[[/size]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="+ The Truth" hide="- Close"]]
##green|Hello! I am Arclund, also known as Arclund-Archivist and Saint Bigfoot. This is my author page, which I hope to expand considerably as time goes on.##

##green|I am an avid worldbuilder and speculative fiction fan outside of the wiki, and that often feeds into the articles I write.##

##green|I am also an amateur mapmaker, which is something that went from a side hobby to becoming tied into some of my work in the fandom and for my writing outside of the Wiki.##
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[size 150%]]**__Written Works__**[[/size]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
**SCPs:**
+ [[[SCP-7042]]] - Mother Nature's Sketchbook
//A Bounty of Verity from Amongst the Sands.//

//Once more, Paper and Pen become Sword.//

//This Little Book Crafting the World's Ward.//
+ [[[SCP-7083]]] - ⱯⱯaondertainment's Wild Hunt
//She smiled at me as I pointed the pistol.//

//I want this to be over.//
+ [[[SCP-7442]]] - Extinction, Her Noble Warriors
//No More Second Chances.//
+ [[[SCP-8016]]] - Gods You Be
//We have lived in your silence all our lives. But the old stories remain in our hearts. We still follow your orders.//
+ [[[SCP-6786]]] - VKTM Presents: Invasive Nature
//Come watch this carefully curated cultured carnage of nature nixing nuisances!//
[[/div]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Tales:**
+ ???
[[/div]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
**GoI Entries:**
+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/excerpt-of-the-naelkaen-bestiary-the-vasasoonenuetae Excerpt of The Nälkän Bestiary - The Vasasoonenütä ]
+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/naelkaen-history-the-legacy-of-orok Nälkän History - The Legacy of Orok]
+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/naelkaen-history-orokin-koetonae Nälkän History - Orokin Kötonä ]
//This selection of writing was retrieved through unsaintly means from one of the many flesh repositories of one of those distant and curious breeds of Sarkics. -Annotation by Sir Penderghast//
+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/critter-profile-diomedes Critter Profile: Diomedes]
+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/critter-profile-portia Critter Profile: Portia]
//Our new friends seem like a bit of a handful, but we've never failed to rise to a challenge before. Let's make them feel at home, yeah?//
[[/div]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Wanderer's Library Works:**
+ [https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/a-soldier-s-dream A Soldier's Dream]
//The Fey claim they know what it means to be abandoned.//

+ [https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/tales-of-creation-myth-truth-other Tales of Creation - Myth, Truth & Other]
//First,//
//They speak of Nothing,//
//But that is a Lie//

+ [https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/arclund-bestiary-entry-1 Arclund Bestiary Entry I]
//The Hungry Hooves//

+ [https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/arclund-bestiary-entry-2 Arclund Bestiary Entry II]
//The Caliendo Straits. Isles Unmoored.//

+ [https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/beasts-of-desert-part-i Beasts of the Desert Part I]
+ [https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/beasts-of-desert-part-ii Beasts of the Desert Part II]
+ [https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/beasts-of-desert-part-iii Beasts of the Desert Part III]
+ [https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/beasts-of-desert-part-iv Beasts of the Desert Part IV]
//Come sit by the fire, and learns of the beasts of this vast land!//
[[/div]]
[[/=]]
